Title: Bunch of Marys
Plot: Martin befriends new boy Trevor in order to dine on his family's regular gourmet meals while Debra is too distracted with political campaigning to feed her youngest child. Ma Moone and her friends hope to incite girl power in the local area by canvassing for politician Mary Robinson, but they're less than thrilled when they're forced to turn to fishy rich man Francie Feeley for funding.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Norma Sheahan, Mary Barry Leonard, Maeve Higgins, Dawn Bradfield, Ruth McCabeRuth McCabeRuth McCabeRuth McCabe, Steve Coogan, Robert Donnelly, Natalia Kostrzewa, Mark Huberman, Tara Flynn, Brendan Frayne, Cillia
